short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes Cyberbass works again in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension change the way how Cyberbass handels your action calls, so that you will be redirected to an .mp3 file instead of something else.

This will fixed the problem on Windows 8, because the Windows Media Player plugin doesn't work there.
